sponsoredLegislation.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate the existing prohibition against payment of aid to families with dependent children where there is an unemployed father receiving unemployment compensation under State or Federal law, thus treating unemployment compensation the same as other income and resources in determining the family's need.
